segments.text: Do you know who Ammo Hung is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . He is now 50 years old . And he started out studying alembics , singing , dancing and martial arts at the age of nine , and has tarred in 140 kung fu films . He has also become an independent producer and director .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know only one aspect of him . Do you know what he would do in the kitchen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . Tell me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the kitchen , with his wife by his side he still puts on quite a dinner time show .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Imagine a chef chopping vegetables on fast forward . Picture a man making a stir-fry , tossing the mixture up in the air , and then catching it , every last bit , in his work . And his culinary motto is ' Enjoy the moment . ' If you want to know hey theycook , visit www.StudioClassroom.com.tw for the recipe .
segments.speaker: S1
